meanings.definition: Lactases: enzymes that break down lactose
meanings.sent2: The lactases in my body help me digest dairy products.
meanings.sent3: The lactases had a party in my stomach, breaking down all the lactose!
meanings.sent4: Her stomach was a bustling city where lactases worked tirelessly to break down lactose.
meanings.sent5: The lactases were like little superheroes fighting the lactose villains in my digestive system.

meanings.definition: Lactases: the plural form of lactase
meanings.sent1: I learned about lactases in my science class.
meanings.sent2: Lactases are important for digesting milk.
meanings.sent3: The group of friends called themselves the Lactases because they loved dairy so much!
meanings.sent4: In the land of Dairyville, the Lactases were the guardians of all things milk-related.
meanings.sent5: The word 'lactases' always reminds me of creamy, delicious ice cream.
